title: ALB - Whispers Under the Moonlight (2014)
brief_description: This music video for ALB’s ‘Whispers Under the Moonlight’ claims to be the world’s first ‘Trojan Horse Music Video’. In order to initially play the video and take part, users download a file to their computer which then initiates a series of benign computer takeovers as part of an interactive art installation on the users computer.

constellations_other.name: Hack the planet
constellations_other.description: How do you represent something that's... kinda boring to look at, like hacking, when you're operating in a visual medium like film, TV and videogames?
